}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :DW 1537 / DW1537 P/N: FFMD6
"Atheros Communications", "CUS251" and "250-02518-010" :is silkscreened on the module in the FCC photos.
''2X2 (1X1) 802.11abgn BT 4.0 PCIe/USB M.2 Combo Module''
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCSNFA282 PPD-QCSNFA282] (2013-09-09) - '''NFA282'''
{{see also|Qualcomm Atheros QCSWB282|Foxconn}}
*[https://www.parts-people.com/index.php?action=item&id=12027 ''Dell Wireless 1537 DW1537 WLAN Card'' on '''parts-people'''] :Low Power 2x2 802.11a/b/g/n WLAN + BT - FFMD6
Compatible Dell Laptops: *'''Dell Venue 11 Pro''' (7130 /7139) Tablet :Dell PN: FFMD6, 0FFMD6 :Part Number: FFMD6 :Bluetooth 4.0
